definition: without missing a week, of or occurring every seven days, a periodical that is published every week (or 52 issues per year)
details:
adverb
- without missing a week
= example: without missing a week
= synonyms: hebdomadally
adjective
- of or occurring every seven days
= example: of or occurring every seven days
= synonyms: hebdomadal, hebdomadary
noun
- a periodical that is published every week (or 52 issues per year)
